content.raw: @{557058:4ded1ddf-947e-4154-bbd1-3dba24f1bdbd} from the images you shared here [https://ci.mil.ufl.edu/labelme/datasets/navigator-datasets/](https://ci.mil.ufl.edu/labelme/datasets/navigator-datasets), it seems that the water is not very transparent, which is why I originally removed the ocean transparency. Let me know how the refraction should look. Honestly not sure how it should look, except distorted and slightly offset \(straight lines have breaks\)
content.html: @Carlos Agüero from the images you shared here https://ci.mil.ufl.edu/labelme/datasets/navigator-datasets/, it seems that the water is not very transparent, which is why I originally removed the ocean transparency. Let me know how the refraction should look. Honestly not sure how it should look, except distorted and slightly offset (straight lines have breaks)
